name: Sports Live Results & Trends
short_description:
The scheduled date of this pay-per-view event is on April 14, 2012 (Saturday). Juan Manuel Marquez and Fedchenko will fight in Mexico City, Mexico while Richard Abril and Brandon Rios will fight at the Mandalay Bay Events Center in Las Vegas, Nevada.

Juan Manuel is the 3-to-1 favorite of this fight. Fedchenko lost only once in his career but his wins are not as impressive as Marquez. Serhiy fought only once outside of Ukraine and his only loss was in a controversial Majority Decision.
